Registry of Open Data on AWS

Unidata GOES-16

agriculture disaster response earth observation geospatial meteorological satellite imagery sustainability weather

Description

GOES provides continuous weather imagery and monitoring of meteorological and space environment data across North America.

Update Frequency

New data is added as soon as it's available

License

There are no restrictions on the use of this data.

Documentation

https://docs.opendata.aws/noaa-goes16/unidata-readme.html

Managed By

See all datasets managed by Unidata.

Contact

support@unidata.ucar.edu

Resources on AWS

  • Description
    Imagery and metadata
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::goesingest
    AWS Region
    us-west-2
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://goesingest/ --no-sign-request
  • Description
    New data notifications, only Lambda and SQS protocols allowed
    Resource type
    SNS Topic
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:sns:us-west-2:492151760762:NewGOES16Object
    AWS Region
    us-west-2
